description: This file defines a Room database class for an Android application, managing notes and categories. It specifies entities, version, singleton instance management, and DAO access methods.

classes.name: NotesDatabase
classes.description: An abstract class extending RoomDatabase, providing access to DAOs and managing the database singleton instance.

methods.name: noteDao
methods.description: Abstract method returning the DAO for Note operations.

methods.name: categoryDao
methods.description: Abstract method returning the DAO for Category operations.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Provides a thread-safe singleton instance of the database, creating it if it doesn't exist.
